admin.helpenable: Use this setting to enable or disable the toast alert
admin.offsetyy: Offset Y - vertical axis margin (px) (blank for default)
admin.offsetydesc: vertical axis margin - can be a number indicating pixel value. Example 20 (pixel)
admin.offsetxx: Offset X - orizontal axis margin (px) (blank for default)
admin.offsetxdesc: orizontal axis margin - can be a number indicating pixel value. Example 20 (pixel)
admin.destdesc: URL to which the browser should be navigated on click of the toast
admin.duration: Duration for which the toast should be displayed -1 for permanent toast
admin.gravdesc: Set the position of the toast, top or bottom are accepted
admin.posdesc: Where u want that the toast appear? left, right or center?
admin.backgrounddesc: put your background color in HEX format - eg "#ffcc00"
admin.messagedesc: Here u can put the text of your alert toast

forum.message1: It is a long established fact that a reader will be distracted by the readable content of a page when looking at its layout.
